tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went to DentalRoots for misaligned teeth of my 8 year  old son. I found the clinic well cleaned and well managed .Dr Anju was punctual in our appointment and made my son extremely comfortable for treatment by his friendly manner.
she then explained the treatment and charges in detail answerd all our queries with patience.
They provided habit breaking appliance to my son and amazingly the misaligned teeth started to straighten in the first week only.
I found there charges nominal as per the services they are providing.
There experience is there strength . I found huge number of patients in there clinic every time I visit.
I recommend dental roots

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was searching for dentist and discovered this by friends recommendations. I've been here for Scaling, RCT and crowns. My treatment was done by Dr Anju prosthodontist. Very Happy  with the treatment, got my smile back. I highly recommend  this dr . The staff is very courteous. *** ******* ** **** ************* *** very helpful.   Wonderful staff from the waiting room to the Dentist’s office to check-out. Pleasant, welcoming, and professional. They go out of their way to please! Very happy :) Thank you all for your efforts.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: For the first time i am writing a review for anyone but it is deserving. I live in Canada recently visited India i had a severe cavity pain before visiting this place now i am perfectly alright and doing good i thank Dr. Anju, she did a great job explaining everything that she was doing and listening to what i had to say. she kept me calm during all of my appointments and answered all my concerns patiently. On a special note thank you all support staff of clinic for your wonderful approach towards patients. Finally, one word about Dr. , you are a great doctor with great skills. Its my pleasure to write review thank you so much and appreciated for your great job. I recommend this clinic everyone.

tags: None
review: I visited for wisdom tooth extraction,but first she understands the problem and then she will explain the solution, and most important while doing RCT if paining Dr Anju Thomas will keep on asking that whether pain is there or not. Very Friendly and Give you the best possible solution.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: visited Dental roots after reading the reviews but i will not recommend it anyone. as my experience is not good.I had visited a month back for tooth ache, and it came out that it was tooth decay. Doctor suggested the filling for that tooth. I was charged 1200 for that filling with no cleaning of other teeth and filling came out within a month. now have to go for filling again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I needed 4 root canal work  to be done, so I asked for recommendations as it's my first time in bangalore.  Dr. Anju thomas reflected the rave reviews from family and friends. Dr. Anju thomas educates her patients and advises priorities, but won't deter from the patients' preference.  What a feeling to matter.  I'm deathly afraid of dentists, but was calmed by her professional team.  If you're still looking, pay them a visit and see for yourself.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: After a lot of work involving multiple visits spanning over 1month, I couldn't be happier with the work I had completed. Dr Anju thomas is incredibly professional and kept me at ease through a cleaning and a few fillings/crowns. At no point did I feel stressed out when getting the dental work done, which was a breath of fresh air after a few negative experiences as a kid!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
I highly recommend Dr Anju thomas .as a nervous patient she explained everything to me and made sure I was completely comfortable and knew everything that was happening. 

Dr Anju thomas made sure that I was not rushed in having procedures done, and clearly explained my options to me and helped me build out a treatment plan for some work I have to have done.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Anju thomas is AMAZING! She is so kind and gentle and very knowledgeable.  She fully explained everything and answered all my questions. tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,

I m very happy and satisfied with the treatment provided by Dr Anju thomas
